result.eng: The house is situated on the bank of the river.
result.ga: Tá an teach suite ar bhruach na habhann
result.orig: Tá an teach suite ar bhruach na habhann
result.html: Tá an teach suite ar bhruach na habhannThe house is situated on the bank of the river.
result.ponchtml: Tá an teaċ suite ar ḃruaċ na haḃannThe house is situated on the bank of the river.

result.eng: On both sides of the river.
result.html: Ar dhá thaobh na habhannOn both sides of the river.
result.ponchtml: Ar ḋá ṫaoḃ na haḃannOn both sides of the river.

result.eng: The river runs through the city.
result.ga: Ritheann an abhainn tríd an chathair
result.orig: Ritheann an abhainn tríd an chathair
result.html: Ritheann an abhainn tríd an chathairThe river runs through the city.
result.ponchtml: Riṫeann an aḃainn tríd an ċaṫairThe river runs through the city.

result.html: Tá sé gar don abhainnIt's near the river.
